title: Galaxy Z TriFold Exposes Fold 7 Flaws — Why Its Screen And Battery Change Everything
description: Samsung's Galaxy Z TriFold exposes the Galaxy Z Fold 7's biggest weaknesses, from screen size to battery life. Here is how Samsung's most ambitious foldable changes everything.
content: The Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold is more than just a new foldable phone. It represents a big leap, one that reveals just how limited even the latest generation of the Galaxy Z Fold (specifically the Sams… [+4668 chars]
